title: I'm still gonna complain about a champion that relies on glitch abuse to be worth anything
body:
Every time my teammate feeds her

#\#gut{{champion:92}}2016
#\#rework{{champion:92}}2016
#\#fuckingfix{{champion:92}}2016

######Yes, animation canceling is glitch abuse, as confirmed by the removal of Zed's in a "bug fix"
